issue.title: [CF 44] Heavy FPS loss
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Just logging in with 2.0.0 Beta 6 installed

What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I see a drop of about 45 FPS.  I have narrowed it down to this mod through a process of elimination (I can replicate this with only this mod active, all others disabled.

What version of the product are you using? 2.0.0 beta6

Do you have an error log of what happened? No errors were generated

Please provide any additional information below. The following is the my saved variables file: -

https://gist.github.com/tmw-issue-import/d1069ec8aa97d20ed71eeaa236c2b00d
> Posted by CurseForge user ShriekBob | Imported from CurseForge issue #44 | Raw

comments.body:
Strange. I'll look into it, but I do not experience any framerate problems at all. Do you have any error catching addons installed? It might be a corrupt setting causing heavy errors that you might not be seeing.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yep, one of your settings is messed up. I had a function in there that could be run to fix it, but I removed it because I thought i fixed the problem. I'll add it back in.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Here is a quick fix: Open the condition editor of each icon that has a condition and just press Okay. Shouln't need to change any settings, I have code in the saving code that should fix this for now.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
